flawed_nl_solution:
In one week there will be 50+20=<<50+20=70>>70 seashells
In two weeks there will be 70+20=<<70+20=80>>80 seashells
In three weeks there will be 80+20=<<80+20=100>>100 seashells
In four weeks there will be 100+20=<<100+20=120>>120 seashells
#### 120

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 90, not 80. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
